content: **knitted bow/christmas decoration in drops flora drops kid-silk and drops glitter the piece is worked from side to side with garter stitch and i-cord theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropsyuletideribbon drops design pattern fl-097 yarn group a + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **size ** length = 94 cm width = 11 cm **yarn** drops flora from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 31 sand and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25 g colour 56 marzipan and use drops glitter from garnstudio 2 spools colour 01 gold *note that yardage above is calculated without glitter as it doesn t play on the gauge* **needles** drops single pointed needles size 3 5 mm **knitting gauge ** 20 stitches in width and 40 row in height with needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
